text: The Embezzler or variant may refer to: * embezzler, a person who embezzles or engages in embezzlement * The Embezzler (1914 film), an American silent short drama film * The Embezzler (1954 film), a British crime film * The Embezzler (1966 book), a book by Louis Auchincloss * The Embezzler (1944 novel), a novel by James M. Cain * The Embezzlers (1926 novel), a novel by Valentin Kataev * "The Embezzler", a character from the 1913 film Bloodhounds of the North
title: The Embezzler
